Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CmkSecretConfig.description: Specifies configuration information for a DataSync-managed secret, such as an authentication token or set of credentials that DataSync uses to access a specific transfer location, and a customer-managed AWS KMS key.

SecretArn.description: Specifies the ARN for an AWS Secrets Manager secret, managed by DataSync.
SecretArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the ARN for an AWS Secrets Manager secret, managed by DataSync.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-eusc|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):secretsmanager:[a-z-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:secret:.*|)$  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.description: Specifies the ARN for the customer-managed AWS KMS key used to encrypt the secret specified for SecretArn. DataSync provides this key to AWS Secrets Manager.
KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the ARN for the customer-managed AWS KMS key used to encrypt the secret specified for SecretArn. DataSync provides this key to AWS Secrets Manager.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-eusc|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):kms:[a-z-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:key/.*|)$  
Update requires: No interruption

CmkSecretConfig.markdownDescription:
Specifies configuration information for a DataSync-managed secret, such as an authentication token or set of credentials that DataSync uses to access a specific transfer location, and a customer-managed AWS KMS key.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

CustomSecretConfig.description: Specifies configuration information for a customer-managed secret, such as an authentication token or set of credentials that DataSync uses to access a specific transfer location, and an IAM role that DataSync can assume and access the customer-managed secret.

SecretArn.description: Specifies the ARN for a customer created AWS Secrets Manager secret.
SecretArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the ARN for a customer created AWS Secrets Manager secret.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-eusc|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):secretsmanager:[a-z-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:secret:.*|)$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecretAccessRoleArn.description: Specifies the ARN for the AWS Identity and Access Management role that DataSync uses to access the secret specified for SecretArn.
SecretAccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the ARN for the AWS Identity and Access Management role that DataSync uses to access the secret specified for SecretArn.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-eusc|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.*|)$  
Update requires: No interruption

CustomSecretConfig.markdownDescription:
Specifies configuration information for a customer-managed secret, such as an authentication token or set of credentials that DataSync uses to access a specific transfer location, and an IAM role that DataSync can assume and access the customer-managed secret.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ManagedSecretConfig.description: Specifies configuration information for a DataSync-managed secret, such as an authentication token or set of credentials that DataSync uses to access a specific transfer location. DataSync uses the default AWS-managed KMS key to encrypt this secret in AWS Secrets Manager.

SecretArn.description: Specifies the ARN for an AWS Secrets Manager secret.
SecretArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the ARN for an AWS Secrets Manager secret.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-eusc|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):secretsmanager:[a-z-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:secret:.*|)$  
Update requires: No interruption

ManagedSecretConfig.markdownDescription:
Specifies configuration information for a DataSync-managed secret, such as an authentication token or set of credentials that DataSync uses to access a specific transfer location. DataSync uses the default AWS-managed KMS key to encrypt this secret in AWS Secrets Manager.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AccessKey.description: Optional. The access key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.
AccessKey.markdownDescription:
Optional. The access key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the DataSync agents that can connect with your object storage system. If you are setting up an agentless cross-cloud transfer, you do not need to specify a value for this parameter.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-eusc|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/agent-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.markdownDescription:
Specifies the Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the DataSync agents that can connect with your object storage system. If you are setting up an agentless cross-cloud transfer, you do not need to specify a value for this parameter.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

BucketName.description: The name of the bucket on the self-managed object storage server.
BucketName.markdownDescription:
The name of the bucket on the self-managed object storage server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

SecretKey.markdownDescription:

X.509 PEM content containing a certificate authority or chain to trust.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 32768  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerHostname.description: The name of the self-managed object storage server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the object storage server.
ServerHostname.markdownDescription:
The name of the self-managed object storage server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the object storage server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9])$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerPort.description: The port that your self-managed server accepts inbound network traffic on.
ServerPort.markdownDescription:
The port that your self-managed server accepts inbound network traffic on.

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption
